content: show your girly side with this cropped loose-fitting crochet cardigan designed in our slightly fuzzy caron colorama haze this chic sweater features a lovely ruffled collar and sleeve cuffs a deep v-neck and a simple tie to close worked in double_crochet with simple square armhole shaping this pattern features a variety of techniques suitable for all skill levels a great layering piece it s an easy way to make any outfit fun and flirty materials caron® colorama haze™ 8 oz/227 g 649 yds/593 m sizes xs/s m l daydream 92001 2 2 2 balls sizes xl 2/3xl 4/5xl daydream 92001 2 2 2 balls sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
